title: Senior Python Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Python Developer with strong experience in Python, Django, APIs, SQL databases, and cloud technologies. The candidate should have excellent problem-solving skills, knowledge of software engineering best practices, and experience working with REST frameworks. Familiarity with version control (Git), Docker, and CI/CD pipelines is a plus. The candidate will be responsible for developing backend systems, improving performance, writing clean code, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
